From the brand

ABOUT US

romision is dedicated to bring you a touch of warmth in cold winter. It is designed for your comfort and warmth, ease of mobility without any bound feeling. We adapt Newest 24-Hour Constant Temperature Technology into material to give your skin ultrasoft feeling.

DESIGNED FOR SPORTS

Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 3.94 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 14.89 Ounces
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé September 14, 2020
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B08HV6RCQH

Pull On closure
Machine Wash
„ÄêAll Day Warm & Comfortable„Äë Our heated thermals for men is made of 92% Polyester and 8% Spandex fabric with Microfiber fleece lined, providing enhanced warmth and insulation. Thus it minimizes heat loss and regulate your body temperature in the cold winter. The tightly closed knitted seams, super Skin-touch and Ultra Soft mens long johns fit snug like a second skin for keeping the cold air out and preserving heat effectively. Keep you Warm and Comfy All Day!
„ÄêSuperior Moisture Wicking„Äë Made of Breathable and Quick-drying fiber perfect to absorb sweat and dry fast in exercise. romision long underwear mens is 60% Higher absorbent than other mens thermals. With moisture transport system and odor control function men thermal underwear set, keep you dry and light, easily absorb the unpleasant smell during workout and keep away from the clammy feeling. You can relax or brave the outdoors pursuing your active lifestyle at any time.
„ÄêExcellent Flexibility for Any Movement„Äë The mens long johns thermal set is designed with 4-way stretch compression, its strong seams won‚Äôt tearing while keeping elasticity. Mens long underwear add range of motion and offer maximum support for body, you‚Äôll feel a sense of freedom in all activities. Besides, designed to increase the amount of oxygen in the blood, our mens base layer can improve blood circulation, protect you from muscle injury and great for outdoor activities.
„ÄêSuit For Any Occasions„Äë Heated base layer men cold weather with classic round neck design, can be worn inside or outside. You can even use it like pajamas stay at home or sports suit go for a walk outside if you wish and no one knows you have worn thermal underwear men it‚Äôs so hip. It is the best mens thermals top and bottom set in cold weather to keep you warm and comfy during skiing, running, jogging, hiking, hunting, walking the dog.
„ÄêWarm Gift for Him„Äë Every man would like to receive such a comfortable and warm men long johns thermal set in cold weather. This thermal for men comes with fleece lining and lightweight provided excellent keep warm performance and windproof function. Wear within a few seconds, you will feel your body heat being trapped inside of the top and bottom. With romision winter underwear thermal men, giving your Lover/Son/Father lasting and warm love during the cold morning.

Heated Thermal Underwear for Men, Fleece Base Layer Men Winter Gear Compression

As the weather gets colder, you want to make you're protected from the cold with mens thermal long johns. They will keep you warm and dry with their moisture-wicking properties, and the snug fit will retain body heat. It will offer full mobility throughout the day.

Compared to other materials, this long underwear for men with excellent Moisture Wicking and Quick Dry performance, instantaneous absorption of sweat after exercise prevents the skin stickiness to protect your musle.

Thanksgiving Gifts for Father, Husband, Boyfriend, Son


I think your father, lover, son, and friends all need such a 24-hour constant temperature mens thermal sets. Don‚Äôt forget to buy one for yourself! When they receive this heart-warming gift, I think they will laugh happily and can't wait to try it on.

Details of romision Thermal Underwear Set

  1. Offer Full Flexibility and Body Movement

    4 Way Stretch High Elasticity

    The mens base layer set is designed with four way stretch fabric, which have high elasticity, increasing the range of motion and provide your body with the greatest degree of freedom and support.


  2. 24 Hours Keep You Warm In Cold Weather

    Fleece Lined

    • Mens thermal underwear set is made of 92% Ultra-Soft Polyester + 8% Spandex blend fabric with Microfiber fleece lined, the insulation material which can lock your body heat well.
    • The super skin-touch and ultra soft long johns for men fit snug like a second skin for minimizing heat loss and keep you warm in the cold winter.


  3. Exquisite Stictching

    Clever Seams & Durable

    Neat and flat sutures, clear and meticulous routing. The well-made four-pin six-wire process, avoids friction between the clothing and the skin. At the same time prevents static electricity.


  4. 2 Way Air Circulation Design Prevent Body Odor

    Sweat Wicking & Quick Dry

    Excellent Moisture Wicking and Quick Dry performance, instantaneous absorption of sweat after exercise prevents the skin stickiness to protect your musle.


  5. Casual and Sport Wear

    Crew Neck & Not Exposed

    Classic round neck design, can be worn inside and outside, more personal and warm, suitable for any combination.


  6. Provide a Full Range of Freedom

    Excellent Elasticity

    Elastic Band at the waist to keep the pants from Being Loose, Suitable for men of All Shapes

NO MORE AWKWARD ADJUSTING THANKS TO ELASTIC SEAMS: Check out the pictures and see how this women‚Äôs thermal underwear set is crafted using elastic seems that keep tops and bottoms from falling down or bunching up (even on long walks to school), and if your family enjoys skiing, snowboarding, or ice skating then Rocky makes a great base layer — but without the sagging and ‚Äòawkward adjustments‚Äô
MACHINE WASHABLE FOR EASY CLEANUP: While cheap Thermal Underwear unravel in the washing machine after only a few cycles, Rocky uses high-quality stitching for thermal leggings and long sleeve shirts that stand up to the washer — even with super-active days and many muddy adventures

About MANCYFIT

MANCYFIT strives to providing superior service to make you 100% satisfied, high-quality and comfortable clothing for your daily life.

What makes our products unique?

MANCYFIT is an international brand and clothing design company founded in 2016. The company was built in a passion for high-quality everyday wear with the goal of making life comfortable.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:06:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Simple, classic, warm and comfortable. This is CL’s brand philosophy for designing men’s thermal clothing. We use high-quality materials, combined with exquisite craftsmanship, to create a new men’s basic base layers in 2022. Let men no longer fear the cold in winter, and let men enjoy the comfort and self-confidence of the whole day!

Package Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 13.5 x 10.55 x 1.85 inches; 12.63 Ounces
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé September 4, 2020
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B08DR7SYF2

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
[All-Day Warm and Comfortable]: Our 2022 brand new upgraded Mens base layer set made of 90% Soft Polyester/ 10% Spandex blend super skin-touch fabric with high-end fleece lined, which gives a velvety feel against your skin, provides definitive comfort while keeping your whole body warm. It’s close-fitting like a second skin, so that you don‚Äôt have to deal with excess fabric bunching and gives you a lot more freedom to enjoy the outdoors. It’s the Best Thermal Clothing for Winter.
[Moisture-wicking & Odor-resistant]: Moisture wicking is important when selecting thermal underwear for men because the worst feeling in the cold winter weather is the clammy, cold sweat that happens, which leads to areas of your body feeling the cold more acutely. While our fleece thermal top and bottom set will wick away moisture fast and absorbing odor, keep you dry and warm and smart odor control. You will enjoy all-day comfortable and confident!
[Tagless & Pee Hole Design]: For even more added comfort, long johns for men thermal have no tags, which reduces any skin irritation; The thermal pants has a elastic waistband that helps to fit most men’s figures and are easily put on and taken off. And the humanized Fly Hole design is perfect for daily life. What’s more, the long underwear are reinforced with design details on the elastic collar at the neckline, cuffs and other joints to help you withstand the cold.

It‚Äôs time to embrace our hardy skivvies as a wardrobe must-have

From daily base layers to those worthier for at-home loafing, from athleisure to winter sports in the snow; No matter your reason for seeking out these cool-weather basics, our 2022 more advanced thermals that are resilient enough to keep things toasty during the most extreme of outdoor activities.

1. Soft & Comfort-The fabric is smooth and skin-friendly; Not easy to pilling, fade; 2. Tagless Design- Avoid to irritate your skin, soft and comfortable to wear; 3. Fleece Lined- Give you a velvety feel against your skin, keep you All-Day Warm; 4. Breathable- Wick away sweat fast and absorb odor;

Enjoy a full day of confidence and comfort!

WHY CHOOSE OUR THERMAL UNDERWEAR FOR MEN

  1. Upgraded 1: Fly/Pee Hole Design

    Pee Hole is Well Placed and Convenient

    Specially designed ergonomic fly/pee hold with two layers of lining for easy insulation, and more convenient and intimate in daily exercise.


  2. Upgraded 2: Fleece Lined

    24 Hours Keep You Warm In Cold Weather

    Our 2022 brand new upgraded Mens base layer set made of 90% Soft Polyester/ 10% Spandex blend super skin-touch fabric with high-end fleece lined, which gives a velvety feel against your skin, provides definitive comfort while keeping your whole body warm.


  3. Upgraded 3: 4 Way stretchy

    Offer Full Flexibility and Body Movement

    The high-stretch spandex fabric fits most men’s bodies and also provides support and stretch for movement, which can help you wear it comfortably all day long. Mens long johns provide all-way stretch and also support quick recovery for warmth and comfort.


  4. Upgraded 4: Exquisite Stictching

    4-Needles 6 Threads

    Neat and flat sutures, clear and meticulous routing. The well-made four-pin six-wire process, avoids friction between the clothing and the skin. At the same time prevents static electricity.


  5. Upgraded 5: Moisture-wicking & Odor-resistant

    Sweat Wicking & Quick Dry

    Our fleece thermal top and bottom set will wick away moisture fast and absorbing odor, keep you dry and warm and smart odor control. You will enjoy all-day comfortable and confident!


  6. Upgraded 6: Wide Elastic Waistband

    Resilient Band Helps To Fit Most Men’s Figures

    For added comfort, the elastic waistband stretches with your body while you move. Easily put on and taken off!


A pair of thermal top and bottom that does the job‚Äîstops winter in its tracks


These men thermal gear can be worn for traditional outdoor winter activities such as hunting, skiing, running, hiking and snowmobiling. Moreover, they can layer under your day-to-day clothes and will keep you warm when you‚Äôre working outside. As well as lounging around the house, or even as pajamas.

ABOUT US

At Thermajohn, we‚Äôre focused on keeping you warm and comfortable. Our thermals are the perfect winter clothing essential, so you keep the cold at bay. With various colors and styles, you will look and feel good all season long.

Heat Retention: When it comes to warmth and everyday wear, these long johns for men is designed specifically for you to stay protected from the cold.
Ultra Soft Fleece: Designed with a fleece lining & quality material, these ultra soft mens thermal underwear set will keep you feeling comfortable throughout the day.
Moisture Wicking: Stay dry with these long underwear mens as they’re made from breathable fabric that effectively wicks away moisture and perspiration.

Thermajohn’s mens long underwear are crafted to meet the needs of every man. Our tops and bottoms are made from premium fabric radiating comfort and durability. With features such as moisture wicking and smart odor control, it is perfect for everyday wear.

Heat Retention

Our mens thermals are designed to retain heat and regulate your body temperature for all day comfort.

Ultra-Soft Fleece

Thermals for men are lined with fleece and made of high quality fabric that feels great on the skin.

Moisture Wicking

Our thermals are made with a breathable fabric that keeps you dry by wicking away moisture.

Read more

4-Way Stretch

Enjoy full mobility with our mens thermal underwear set that features a stretchable fabric.

Tagless

The tagless design and flatlock seams reduces chafing that causes discomfort for a better fit against your skin.

Fly/ Pee Hole

We designed our thermals with a built-in fly/pee-hole so you can answer nature‚Äôs call quickly.
